comments.author: Adam
comments.content: I go on the assumption that constructive complaints make things better. So, if there is this rule that person can't complain about free things, then free things will never benefit from criticism.  A lot of open source projects are bad, and some good, constructive criticism would really help.  Instead, too many people take that as an attack, and they rally the troops.  Not everyone has the ability to help out, but many of us can see problems.
